item.title: Elizabeth Mitchell - Oh, John the Rabbit
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C (lowered from the original Key of E)
As performed by Elizabeth Mitchell.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Elizabeth Mitchell - Little Liza Jane
item.description:
For Educational Use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. In the Key of G: G, C, Hawaiian D7.
Performance by Elizabeth Mitchell, in her original key. Please support her work and purchase her songs/albums.
Little Liza Jane is another song used in the Tampa Bay Ukulele Society Beginner Handbook.
Prepared in Luma Fusion for iOS. Ukulele Chord Font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com

item.title: Elizabeth Mitchell - This Land Is Your Land
item.description:
A Ukulele Play Along version of This Land Is Your Land in the Key of C (F, C, G7). Song by Woody Guthrie, performance by Elizabeth Mitchell. For educational purposes. Audio edited to just include a few verses from this lyric video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rRnHx3yVuf4.
Many of the ukulele play alongs are created with pop music to keep students engaged. I am 100% behind that effort--however, I am trying to bring songs that are often used at ukulele jam sessions to this format as well, so that all players can become material with some of the more common "ukulele songs" and sing and play together.
The chord fonts used in this set come from Chordette for Education, from ukefarm.com
